name: Dumbbell Triceps Extension
how_to_perform:
1. Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your arm hanging straight down from your shoulder.
2. Extend your arm fully, keeping your upper arm still and only moving your forearm and hand.
3. Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbow, keeping control throughout the movement.
4. Focus on contracting your triceps muscle as you lower the weight.
5. Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement.
6. Return to the starting position by extending your arm fully again, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
7. Repeat with the same hand, then switch to the other hand.
short_summary: Dumbbell Triceps Extension is an isolation exercise that targets the triceps muscle.
